author: cnbc.com
title: Core Canadian Dividend Trust Declares Monthly Fund Distribution
text:
TORONTO, April 03, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- (TSX:CDD.UN) Core Canadian Dividend Trust declares a monthly fund distribution in the amount of $0.03320 per unit, payable on April 30, 2018 to unitholders of record on April 13, 2018.
For further information, please contact Investor Relations at 416.681.3966, toll free at 1.800.725.7172 or visit www.strathbridge.com .
John Germain, Senior Vice-President & CFO
Strathbridge Asset Management Inc.
121 King Street West
Suite 2600
Toronto, Ontario, M5H 3T9
416.681.3966; 1.800.725.7172
